amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in House Report 116-459 to reduce spending in Division C (Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies) by 5 percent.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce spending in Division C (Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies) by 5 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 117 - 292 (Roll no. 162).

action.text: Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 117 - 292 (Roll no. 162).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 117 - 292 (Roll no. 162).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Allen.
